text: This list includes all players from the West Indies who have played at least one ODI match after debuting in 1973. ==Key== General * – Captain * – Wicket-keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Inn – Number of innings batted * NO – Number of innings not out * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * 100 – Centuries scored * 50 – Half-centuries scored * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * * – Batsman remained not out Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket * Eco – Average runs conceded per over Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings taken ==Players== Statistics are correct as of 21 March 2023. title: List of West Indies ODI cricketers
